articles.title: It's official: Ivorian cager Angelo Kouame now a Filipino citizen - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Ateneo big man can suit up for the national team in the third window of the 2021 FIBA Asia Cup qualifiers next month in Clark, Pampanga.
articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, May 18) Ivorian basketball player Angelo Kouame has been granted Filipino citizenship after President Rodrigo Duterte signed into law a bill seeking his naturalization,… [+1192 chars]
